description: This Java class initializes sample data for the application on startup if the notes repository is empty. It defines a configuration class for Spring Boot that creates a CommandLineRunner bean to seed initial notes data.

classes.name: DataInitializer
classes.description: Spring configuration class that provides a CommandLineRunner bean to seed sample notes data.

methods.name: seedNotes
methods.description: Creates sample Note objects and saves them to the repository if it is empty during application startup.
